alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 3:36AM CDT until May 07 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Van Buren. * WHEN...From late tonight to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs along the shoreline from the I-540 bridge east towards Lavaca. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 19.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 23.0 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
